pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cross-Validated Kernel Ensemble // Implementation of Cross- Validated Kernel Ensemble (CVEK), a flexible modeling framework for robust nonlinear regression and hypothesis testing based on ensemble learning with kernel-ridge estimators (Jeremiah et al. (2017) arXiv:1710.01406 and Wenying et al. (2018) arXiv:1811.11025). It allows user to conduct nonlinear regression with minimal assumption on the function form by aggregating nonlinear models generated from a diverse collection of kernel families. It also provides utilities to test for the estimated nonlinear effect under this ensemble estimator, using either the asymptotic or the bootstrap version of a generalized score test.
